triples.name: Behavioral Ecology
triples.relevance: The paper synthesizes research on individual behavioral variation within the field of behavioral ecology and its evolutionary basis.

triples.name: Personality in Animals
triples.relevance: Animal personality (behavioral types) is the central subject of study, examining consistent individual differences in behavior.

triples.name: Life History
triples.relevance: The pace-of-life syndrome hypothesis relates to life history strategies and how they interact with behavioral variation.

triples.name: Evolution
triples.relevance: The paper examines the evolutionary causes and consequences of individual behavioral variation across species.
